gradient.subtitle: How to enhance and enrich your data streams?
gradient.description:
An IoT (Internet of Things) platform plays a central role by gathering data and communications from connected devices. Its primary goal: to simplify the collection, storage, and processing of indicators derived from data, in order to better manage the connected environment and even automate its operations.

Are you considering leveraging your data through an IoT platform? Take a few moments to explore the operating mode that characterizes this type of ecosystem.

hosting.title: Choose the hosting mode according to your needs
hosting.description:
Two hosting modes are available with our software suite:
you can choose between shared hosting (SaaS mode) or dedicated hosting (On-Premise mode).
hosting.saas_body:
SaaS architecture allows a software solution to be used online, anywhere and anytime, from a browser.

How does it work?

The software is off-site and accessible remotely via a network, for a subscription fee to the publisher/host, on any browser.
- Fully digitized solution
- Maintenance and updates provided by the supplier
- Data access: Cloud computing
- Turnkey solution
- Data protection depends on the provider
- Off-site data
hosting.onprem_body:
On-premise solutions are software whose architecture is physically present within a company.

How does it work?

- The software is installed on the company's servers, which must first purchase a license from the publisher to use the software.
- Remote access possible
- Maintenance and updates depend on the internal IT department
- Data access: even without internet
- Internal data security
- On-site hosted data

accompaniment.title: We support you throughout your entire project
accompaniment.p1: As a software publisher, connectivity is at the heart of our business, both in our offerings and in the platforms we design. To provide a solution and service that is both comprehensive and unique, we integrate devices designed by our manufacturing partners directly into our intelligent platforms.
accompaniment.p2: To support you across the entire IoT value chain to guarantee the success of your project.
accompaniment.p3: Tell us about your project, and together we will identify a use case, from which the solution made for you will emerge.
accompaniment.p4: From the choice of devices to the leveraging of your data, including the choice of connectivity, our role is to build a project with you that reflects your vision. Our experts have written, just for you, a connectivity guide to assist you during step 2: connect your devices!
